content: corner st and finish off instead rejoin at the corner of the short side of the other tapered end photo - 3c single_crochet evenly along the tapered end to the corner slip_stitch in the corner st photo - 3d finish off weave in all ends 3a- 3 single_crochet in the 3b- slip_stitch in the next st corner st completed the corner stitch is i know it looks weird marked with a sm but when you weave it in it will blend in 3c- rejoin at the corner of the short 3d- single_crochet evenly along the tapered end to the side of the other corner slip_stitch in the tapered end the corner st is corner st completed marked with a sm **this pattern and all photos are property of winter wool designs and protected by copyright ** page 3 copyright winter wool designs 2023 p i
